INNOVATIVE IDEA : FREE-FOR-ALL SURF

What ?
------

A free for all plugin. Everyone vs everyone. 

Why ?
-----

Surfing has never been a team based game mod. There is no strategy involved, people simply try to kill the most ennemies. It would bring something different in surf, bring people to spacedout servers and a lot of surf problems will be fixed (see pros section).

How ?
-----

Everyone could shoot at everyone. Spawns won't change but Spawn protections will last more to avoid spawnkilling.

Pros
-----

* No more endless rounds.
* Rounds will be more dynamic
* No more unfair teams
* No more noobs carried by good people
* A rank system that actually means something
* More skill based
* No more camping 
* Could be the difference from other servers that will bring people to spacedout servers
* Can work on either multimap or greatriver maps
* Noobs will improve caster
* Pros will have actual challenge cause they will always fight eachother

Cons
-----

Fucking none
